name: Nimian's Manufacture Hunter Pack
description: Heavy case which contains NM150 sniper rifle, some ammo for it, maintenance kit (sadly, without batteries), and Last Hope pistol-shotgun as a... free gift? The label says it's preferred choice for hunters.
